short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate secure passwords, manage TOTP, and store encrypted notes. Fully customizable, offline, and sync-ready.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unserializable is your all-in-one tool for generating secure usernames, passwords, and text, managing TOTP with advanced customization, and storing encrypted notes. Enjoy offline usage, end-to-end encryption, and unlimited device sync. Stay secure and in control with a fully customizable, private experience.

Features:
- Custom configurable username/password/text generator
- Support specified length and format of random text, auto increment number, custom formatted time, and text.
- Authenticator (TOTP) management, support camera and image QR code scan, text input, and customized parameters such as SHA512, 10 digits.
- Text notes

Security:
- End-to-end encryption with your master password

Ease to use:
- Offline mode (No registration required)
- Sync between unlimited devices
- Dark mode and multiple language support
